name: Keith Webster
body:
Hello there! While this page is under construction, it's primary focus will be on providing samples of my works. I specialize in C++, C#, and Unreal Engine 4's Blueprint scripting system. ### Blueprint Samples

Generating abilities for a base character class in a pvp game.

Basic projectile/player collision in multiplayer game with debugging.

Modifying cooldown of a character ability to display based on character status.

Character basic attack and ability activation over server as well as categorization of functions and macros. ### C# Samples ### C++ Samples ### Contact Information Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support]Check out my [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kwebster792) page to see past projects as well as employment history and skillset.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
